name: W4 Training
description:
*The bloodstone explosion unearthed a portal to a place where few have beenâ€”and none have escaped. Deconstruct the mysteries and learn the true story of one of history's most misunderstood figures.*

This is the fourth raid wing and probably the most beginner-friendly one in the game right now! We will have four encounters:
<:cairn:703930782003101758> **Cairn** - An easy but chaotic boss that favours condi DPS.
<:mursaat:703930783680954459> **Mursaat Overseer** - An easy boss that lets you show of your rotation.
<:samarog:703930783257329714> **Samarog** - An easy CC-heavy boss that favours power DPS.
<:deimos:703930783257067551> **Deimos** - A difficult, punishing boss where any kind of DPS works.

The <:alac_healer:1023021148612595793> **Heal Alacrity (Tank)** will be expected to tank <:mursaat:703930783680954459> **Mursaat Overseer** (using the `Claim` mechanic) and <:deimos:703930783257067551> **Deimos**. Tanking on <:deimos:703930783257067551> **Deimos** is toughness-based, so you're expected to take some toughness via gear such as `Minstrel's` or `Giver's` to take aggro.

The :brown_heart: **Heal Alacrity** will be responsible for pushing and CCing Rigom at <:samarog:703930783257329714> **Samarog**. Depending on your class, this may require you to bring a different weapon (e.g. longbow on <:druid:763700489011068939> **Druid**). 

The ðŸ©¸ **DPS (Hand Kiter)** will need to play DPS for the first three bosses and swap to a specialized build to do the `Hand Kiting` mechanic on Deimos. This is a role that requires a lot of survivability and I recommend bringing some toughness trinkets. <:soulbeast:818775299805413386> **[Soulbeast](https://snowcrows.com/builds/ranger/soulbeast/handkite-soulbeast)** and <:herald:818773507286499328> **[Herald](https://snowcrows.com/builds/revenant/herald/hand-kite-herald)** are popular choices, but other builds can also do the job. You can also find PoV videos in <#1053246449212739604>.

Let me know if you have any questions!
